QuestData.Title: A Weezil in the Henhouse
QuestData.Description: <Gann grasps you with a blood-caked hand.>$B$BMy wounds are great but I will not rest until the dwarves of Bael Modan pay for their crimes. <Wheeze> We smuggled a man inside their fortress during our last raid. A goblin saboteur: Weezil Slipshadow. $B$BCreate a disruption at the gates - kill who you can - then slip inside the fortress of Bael'dun to the south and find Weezil.$B$BThat stronghold <cough> can only be destroyed from within, and Weezil can't do it alone.
QuestData.LogDescription: Head into the Bael'Dun Keep and kill 10 Bael'Dun Dwarves (Riflemen, Soldiers, and Officers.) Then find Weezil Slipshadow, who should be hiding within.
QuestData.RewardText: You do good work, $c. That riot you caused at the fortress entrance has these dwarves running around with their heads cut off.
